summary.p: MTL s.v. naṉṉeṟi: நன்னெறி naṉṉeṟi , n. id. +. 1. Righteous conduct, path of virtue, moral life; சன் மார்க்கம். ஏமஞ்சார் நன்னெறியுஞ் சேர்கலார் (நாலடி, 327). 2. A didactic poem of 40 stanzas composed by Civa-p-pirakāca-muṉivar, 17th c.; 17-ஆம் நூற்றாண்டிலிருந்த சிவப்பிரகாசமுனிவரியற்றிய ஒரு நீதிநூல்.
Text and commentary (1 stanza followed by its commentary).
Incomplete: the manuscript starts in the middle of the commentary ad stanza 3.
Paratexts: running title on left margin.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. A few boreholes and truncation.

collation.desc: 20 folios = Naṉṉeṟi: Mūlam + Urai. Tamil foliation 43-511, 512-62. 295 x 35 mm. f43, f55, f58 truncated. f62v blank.
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc: BnF register information, in black ink: R.C. 7881 (f[1]v).

acquisition.p: Acquired, December 18th, 1886, from M. Haas. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 2 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1893, no. 7881.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
